body.name: ASUS TUF Gaming 32" 1440P HDR Curved Monitor (VG32VQ1B) - QHD (2560 x 1440), 165Hz (Supports 144Hz), 1ms, Extreme Low Motion Blur, Speaker, FreeSync Premium, VESA Mountable, DisplayPort, HDMI,BLACK

Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 4 hrs 10 mins
features: 31.5-inch WQHD (2560x1440) 1500R gaming monitor with ultrafast 165Hz refresh rate (supports 144Hz) designed for professional gamers and immersive gameplay
ASUS Extreme Low Motion Blur (ELMB ) technology enables a 1ms response time (MPRT) together with Adaptive-sync, eliminating ghosting and tearing for sharp gaming visuals with high frame rates
FreeSync Premium technology supported through DisplayPort and HDMI ports providing variable refresh rates for low latency, stuttering-free and tearing-free while gaming
Shadow Boost enhances image details in dark areas, brightening scenes without over-exposing bright areas
Supports HDR-10 to enhance bright and dark area, delivers lifelike gaming experience
Robust connectivity with HDMI (v2.0) x2 and DisplayPort 1.2
3-month Adobe Creative Cloud: Receive complimentary access with the purchase of this product (valid from 9/15/2021 to 8/31/2024)
body.description: Designed for fast-paced games, the TUF Gaming VG32VQ1B is a 31.5” curved gaming display that boasts a 165Hz refresh rate. Equipped with Extreme Low Motion Blur (ELMB), VG32VQ1B eliminates motion blur for a smoother gaming experience, while FreeSync Premium technology eliminates screen tearing and choppy frame rates.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 31.5-inch Immersive Curvature Delivers stunning visuals from all angles with a 1500R curvature that ensures every point is equidistant to your eyes. This contributes to greater viewing comfort thanks to its wide viewing angle, which provides less distortion and color shift when gaming and watching movies. 165Hz Refresh Rate Decimates lag and motion blur to give you the upper hand in first-person shooters, racers, real-time strategy, and sports titles. This ultrafast refresh rate lets you play at the highest visual settings for you to react instantly to what's on-screen. Extreme Low Motion Blur (ELMB) Features the latest ASUS-exclusive technology to achieve 1ms MPRT and eliminate smearing and motion blur, making objects in motion look sharper for more fluid and responsive gameplay.

Shadow Boost Technology Clarifies dark areas of the game without overexposing brighter areas, improving overall viewing while also making it easier to spot enemies hidden in dark areas of the map. GamePlus Technology Offers in-game enhancements that help you get more out of your game. This function is co-developed with input from pro gamers, allowing them to practice and improve their gaming skills. Flicker-Free Technology Reduces flicker to minimize eyestrain for improved comfort when you're embroiled in long gaming sessions.

Ultra-Low Blue Light Technology Reduces the amount of potentially harmful blue light emitted by the display. Four different filter settings are available to control the amount of blue light reduction. Rich Connectivity Options include HDMI(v2.0) x2 and DisplayPort 1.2. Ergonomic Design Provides tilt and swivel so you can easily find your ideal viewing position. The display is also VESA-compatible for wall mounting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This Monitor is absolutely incredible. The build quality, picture quality, refresh rate, etc. are amazing. Going from 60hz to 120hz feels unreal. It is very smooth and so much more responsive. To be honest, I did not expect this Monitor to be this big, and I was very surprised when it arrived. The only thing that is bad about this Monitor is the built in speakers. They sound very like muffled and bad. But, they are good enough for me. Also, the fact that it is not height adjustable does bother me a little bit, since the Monitor is pretty high, but I can easily just adjust my chair. Overall, I give this Monitor a 9/10. Incredible Experience. Highly Recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The bare minimum for gaming AND MORE!
reviews.reviewText: A lot of people say theres barely a difference in 60 vs 144hz. Whoever says that lie. This monitor makes me WISH I bought it sooner. The high resolution mixed with its high refresh rate makes for such a crisp and smooth experience.Pros:Great quality, feels sturdy.Vesa mounting built in.High refresh rate and resolution.Lots of settings to mess with if you choose.Cons:From certain angles the colors can be a bit iffy.Overall, I highly recommend this monitor for not only its features, but its price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An excellent monitor for a very competitive price
reviews.reviewText: An excellent monitor, I have two now. It ticks all my boxes: 1440p resolution, high refresh rate, low latency, a good curved profile, simple but useful features, good brightness without vignetting, excellent color gamut, no ghosting, no dead pixels. And it does all of this at an extremely competitive price. A textbook top-notch Asus product. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I upgraded from the Viewsonic VP3481 34" professional monitor. I paid $1200 each for two of them 4 years ago. This ASUS monitor is far superior in every respect. The blacks are deep, the clarity of the picture is what has me hooked. I spend hours in front of the computer, and eye strain is a real issue. These monitors have resolved that for me. I bought 3 other brands of monitors before keeping these. I bought the Corsair 32" monitor, but it is misleading. It does not have 3 USB ports. It has two, and one USB-C port that is an input port. This monitor has 3 full USB ports. The 180hz refresh is really something.You will not regret buying these monitors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I didn't know what I was missing
reviews.reviewText: This monitor is awesome. I got the 1440p 27inch curved variant.Picture/screen: Before this I had a basic 1080p 24inch Asus monitor, and let me tell you the upgrade was very much worth it. The color on this screen just pops. WAY more color coverage then my old monitor. I hadn't realized just how many colors I was missing until now. That being said I did try the HDR because it does advertise it, but I would say that its just not quite there. The screen is brighter , yes, but I would say that you lose at least 20% color coverage if not more. Frankly HDR is bland. I wouldn't recommend it at all if that's a big sale point for you. I also have a decent amount of back light leak, so blacks aren't as dark as they could be (part of the reason HDR isn't that great on this unit). For those 2 reasons I knocked of a star.Gaming: This is the main reason I bought the monitor. Playing on here has been a dream. I mostly play Apex and again the color coverage is out of this world. The contrast is RICH, like batman rich. It's easy to overdo to the point where you cant see people in dark areas. Although some fiddling around in the settings fixed that right up. On that point factory setting are okay but ounce you calibrate it, its twice as good. The curve and upgrade in size and resolution took me some getting used to but once I got used to it again, gaming has been nothing but spectacular. I have had no screen tearing, practically no motion blur and input lag is non existent. That being said I stay consistently around 100-110 FPS, so I haven't maxed it out.Ergonomics: This is where I can't really say to much. I didn't even unwrap the stand, instead I immediately mounted it to my own desk top stand (VESA 100mm x 100mm). I did this because the factory stand seems to be a pretty basic one. No height or swivel adjustment, just tilt.In conclusion Picture good. HDR bad, gaming fun. Stand doodoo.

Fantastic Monitor. Upgraded from 1080p to this 1440p monitor. The colors are so nice, the text and image quality is crisp. Gaming is buttery smooth, with excellent colors. If you are upgrading from 1080p, you will love this monitor.
Very nice, I enjoyed unboxing and place long it on my desk. Damn it was big. It came quick, and nice quality.
No se van a arrepentir, excelente monitor la función de subir bajar o rotar el monitor es genial, producto de calidad.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very good price for this monitor
reviews.reviewText: You get 32 inch IPS display 165hz and 1ms and it’s curved so I would say it’s a steal and it has custom crosshair menu for fps games and the colour quality is good
